channel.title: Can't run client on 64-Bit Vista? PLEASE HELP!
channel.description:
Hey guys, I recently decided to go back to RSPS's instead of runescape, and I recently upgraded my computer to vista. I got my server up and running but when I start my client, it works for about 20 seconds then crashes >.> Any ideas? and if anyone can help with this problem, thank you ahead of time ^_^
[center]Screen: [img]http://www.masterhax.us/error.png[/img] [/center]
Error log is attached below:

could you please explain what I do with this… “converter” ?

EDIT - i tried using the thing you sent me, I followed the instructions inside and it still crashes, any ideas?
